snippet.title: The Invincible - Teaser Trailer
snippet.description:
The Invincible is a first-person retro-futuristic sci-fi thriller.
Support the development, Wishlist on Steam now: 🚀 https://bit.ly/TheInvincible

Remember, there are consequences to the actions you take. Where will your choices lead you? 
While the first questions are answered, new ones appear.

The first teaser of The Invincible is here.
Coming in 2022 to consoles and PC.

Based on the iconic novel by the same name, The Invincible is a first-person retro Sci-Fi adventure thriller set in an atompunk world.

Twitter: https://twitter.com/StarwardInd
Facebook https://www.facebook.com/StarwardIndustries/

Visit https://www.invinciblethegame.com/ for more info.

#theinvincible #retrofuture #scifi #pcgame #consolegame #videogame
